content: learn how to crochet this half and half granny triangle shawl - half traditional triangle granny and half granny square motifs if you want a fun unqiue shawl which is vastly easier to make than it looks then lets get crocheting for my personal shawl i used 2 and a half caron cinnamon swirl cakes in the shade oyster with 2 and ahalf balls of cygnet supersoft aran in the shade white for joining with a 5 5mm hook this gave me a shawl size of approximately 76 inches 193 cm across the top edge and 52 inches 132 cm along the side edges i did 36 row for my granny stripe half
